attributes.action: Not provide any state funding for the funeral of Margaret Hilda Thatcher as she was a great believer in privatisation and the withdrawal of state funds and to inform her how the British public feel about funding her funeral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Margaret Hilda Thatcher was involved in the job losses of many people. She was a driving force for privatisation and stated "I didn't add to the queue" regarding state funding of healthcare. 

State funding of her funeral would run contrary to this belief system.

Her associations with the Chilean dictatorship of General Augusto Pinochet and the South African apartheid further illustrate her attitudes.
